title: Clear as a Bell feat. Carla Hall
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Chef, author, and TV personality Carla Hall (Carla and the Christmas Cornbread, Holiday Baking Championship) plays a sly, surprising judge in this courtroom tale with roots in China and the Ozarks.
